about_the_game:
Team up with your friends, search for a match online or play by yourself - Iniquity Survivors offers you the action-roguelite bullethell experience you always wanted to share with your friends.

Work together as a team to slay hordes of enemies or stand by yourself and butcher them all!




Each map consists of 2 Stages, 2 Intermissions and 1 Boss-Stage.
Reaching the Intermission Phase changes the map - be it a sudden snowstorm, thunderous storms or unbearable heat - you must find a way around the new challenge which the map has in for you. Buy powerups at the trading outpost and prepare wisely ...




Unlock and choose from a variety of runes for diverse and unique playstyles, providing playstyle-changing effects or granting a huge bonus to conquer even the hardest matches!




Mill flowers, craft inks and potions to assist you in combat at the alchemists table! Research and unlock new potion recipes or upgrade the quality of your existing ones.
[NOTE: This feature is not available in the demo version!]





Collect ressources from various maps, craft and upgrade powerful artifacts to increase your stats, gain powerful effects and make runs at higher difficulties easier (or even possible!)
[NOTE: This feature is not available in the demo version!]




Choose between 3 powerful Upgrades after every wave and create your build as you want!
Heal or Tank for your team, play as a powerful Attackpower-based damage dealer, explore mysterious Magic with a focus on Spellpower or create your own broken build - with a great variety of unique powerups after each wave you can craft your own experience!




Survive the waves of enemies thrown at you, gain strength and challenge various bosses in the final stage of each map. Bosses feature a great variety of abilities and mechanics, so prepare well, but defeating it will grant you great bonus rewards!




Select torments, additional challenges, to make your runs harder and more interesting, granting you additional rewards when completing a run!



Can I play solo or without friends?
Yes! There is a Singleplayer-Mode which allows you to play all by yourself.

When is the full release?
I do not want to disclose our final release date yet, so please stay patient!

Will you support other languages and offer controller-support in the future?
I might - depends a bit on how well the game is received :)

Who is Rivenous Studio?
I am a solo-dev who just likes making games.

I have another question, where can I ask?
You can always join the Iniquity Discord-Server () and ask your question right over there! I will be happy to answer your questions and listen to your feedback!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Violence, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer, 64 bit
  • Processor: 2.5Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Minimum System Requirements might change in the future

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 3060 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB

short_description: Iniquity Survivors is a Coop Arena Roguelite, where you slay hordes of enemies either by yourself or with up to 3 friends or strangers online. Acquire new powers, create broken builds and use your spells wisely to survive and defeat the final boss at the end of each map!
